Articles.Content:
I shall defend by throwing potatoes at it and hoping it gets fat.

EDIT: Also that Oppenheimer quote fit so well but what is it? (the ship)

Edited May 17, 2014 by Megalodon 720
A "rods from god"-type station, with strong orbital adjustment rockets and lots of kinetic-kill rounds.

Haha I have one of those still from a while ago The download is in my Sig

Low Orbit KInetic Bombardment Platform

Yup, I based mine off of ODIN from Ghosts, even though I really dislike that game. The designs were semi-cool, though.

Also, mine fires 8 small rods at once, for anti-vehicle/personnel uses. And for spammin'.

So anybody else like the new look of the Arcadia Industries Midway Class Destroyer after the Pearl Harbors Refit?

OLD MIDWAY

So anybody else like the new look of the Arcadia Industries Midway Class Destroyer after the Pearl Harbors Refit?

http://i.imgur.com/52NH3Y0.png

OLD MIDWAY

http://i.imgur.com/HBI6Rb6.png

Looks good, I wish my boat-building attempts would go that well...

The AGN Iwo Jima refueling during patrol of the Runway Island. Moving the AINF Pearl Harbor to Intercept soon.

Pearl Harbor Defected to Arcadia Industries and was Refitted in the picture above.
I tried building a rod from God station once, the station was fine and absolutely beautiful but I couldn't get the missiles to hit there Mark, in other words, I'm a terrible aim.

I tried building a rod from God station once, the station was fine and absolutely beautiful but I couldn't get the missiles to hit there Mark, in other words, I'm a terrible aim.

The trick is making sure the rods won't delete at 2.5 km if you're shooting at the surface, and just remember: IRL, a rod hitting even NEAR a target would be devastating.

Yea or use Winglets, I'm thinking of redoing mine with Winglets if I didn't, can't remember if I did or not.

Also Script you can use the old Midway in your company, I don't think I'm going to use the old one anymore.

Many things!

Not so many things.

Apart from weapons the Cichlid didn't need much revamping in the end.

Yea or use Winglets, I'm thinking of redoing mine with Winglets if I didn't, can't remember if I did or not.

Also Script you can use the old Midway in your company, I don't think I'm going to use the old one anymore.

Ok, thanks. I'll see what... upgrades... will work with it.
That's a nice boat spartwo... wish mine were like that.

Due to the high part count and somewhat large size of my ODP-1 Thor, I've made a mini-sat version that can be deployed en masse, controlled by a starship, ground station, or an ODP-1's crew.

Meet the ODP-2 Sif.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Hehe nice, a Counter part to the LOKI Finally, I need to make a new one anyways. Well anyways Arcadia Industries has answered the Growing Threat to their Island from the Arcadian Union with a New Stealth Frigate, the AINF Coral.

Eliminating a crew adds to stealth apparently
Anyone down for a little skirmish? I've got a smaller destroyer I want to test out a bit .

Anyone down for a little skirmish? I've got a smaller destroyer I want to test out a bit .

I'm game but can we do it later

I'm game but can we do it later

Yeah sure. Actually I thought it'd be cool if we could have a multi-person battle. Maybe a 2v2? I've never done one before but if enough people are interested I think it would be fun.

What's the Tonnage? I have a new Frigate I want to test

(We're refering to space right?)
At launch it is 41 T. And yes I mean in space hahaha.
Dangit, Too heavy I think, My frigate is somewhere around 31 to 27, let me check.

Dangit, Too heavy I think, My frigate is somewhere around 31 to 27, let me check.

We could do a two v. three type deal where you have three frigates, I have two destroyers or something.
Multi people is very difficult due to organization

Multi people is very difficult due to organization

Ah ok, well then we can skip that.
Nah, I'll just stick with updating my Navy, I wish everyone else would work on a navy so I have a use for my ships.
